tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my wisdom teeth extracted in 2021 in Sarojini Dental Hospital, and later, Dr. KA Jeevan Kumar did the same procedure for my son. Yesterday, he skillfully removed all four of my daughter's wisdom teeth at once. Dr. Jeevan Kumar is not only highly skilled but also genuinely caring. The hospital environment is very friendly, and the staff greets everyone with smiles. Dr. Jeevan is always available for pre- and post-treatment consultations and is happy to take calls and listen to any concerns. His professionalism and compassionate care have made a significant difference for our family. Thank you, Doctor!

review: Friendliness of the doctor, relevant questions,good treatment, very efficient Doctor. We have been in the Dr's care since 8years, good follow up,explanation from the Dr after showing the imaging  of the mouth, where he tell us in detail what has to be done and how best to get it done.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jeevan of  Sarojini Dental hospital is an expert and confident dentist. From August 2021, I suffered from a weird gum infection I visited three dentists but they failed to identify the cause  and did root canal several times Five months I used antibiotics Finally , in the last week of November pus bubble started oozing out When I consulted Dr Jeevan, he assured me that I was in the safe hands  on December 3rd 2021 , he identified that infection was due to failed old root canal and pulled it out and treatment procedure started   In the last week of February 2022 ,new set of crown was fixed  Now I am healed Thanks to Dr Jeevan and his staff

The hospital environment is very friendly, and the staff greets everyone with smiles. tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jeevan of  Sarojini Dental hospital is an expert and confident dentist. From August 2021, I suffered from a weird gum infection I visited three dentists but they failed to identify the cause  and did root canal several times Five months I used antibiotics Finally , in the last week of November pus bubble started oozing out When I consulted Dr Jeevan, he assured me that I was in the safe hands  on December 3rd 2021 , he identified that infection was due to failed old root canal and pulled it out and treatment procedure started   In the last week of February 2022 ,new set of crown was fixed  Now I am healed Thanks to Dr Jeevan and his staff

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I live in Canada & was recommended by my Cousin & Brother. I did come to do Dental Implants for the entire Upper & lower Jaw as the cost in Canada was too high. This job started with Emails & WhatsApp calls & this Job was then done on schedule This entire job was done in 2 sessions in November & February. Dr. Jeevan & his staff were very professional & the job was done to my complete satisfaction. I now have a perfect set of Teeth which will be maintenance-free for the rest of my life.
Dr. Jeevan is a Professional & I would recommend his services to everyone.
I suggest you call him & work out a schedule as per your priority & he will do the rest - You will not be disappointed.

Please do not hesitate to call me if you need any further clarification.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Gingivitis,  Sensitivity, and pain ,,lead me to visit Doctor at Sarojini Dental Care .Doctor  .was very kind,, the assistant showed me in, ,After  X-ray ,and due examination,the Doctor explained me that  I have Cavities ,that need root canal treatment, and Capping .
   Doctor started treatment on the first day,then  fixed the gap with Caps on my second visit, and I was relieved of my suffering!!,,No waiting , immediate attention,fast n painless treatment,Friendly talk of the Doctor, mainly , Affordable fee charged, ,filled me with Gratitude,to Dr.Jeevan Kumar ,.May God fruitify his work more and spread countless    Smiles of confidence to all who look up to his care .!        ..                                  
       Mrs.Ruth .Bhushan.  20th July'2020.
